Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a problem situation where people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a design of a string telephone showing two tin cans and a string connecting them.
The student can depict how sound travels through the string to communicate between the two students.
The student can label the parts of the device and explain how it uses sound to send information.
The student can show how this device solves the problem of communicating over a distance without electronic technology.
The student can include details about how this type of communication helps people connect despite being far apart.
